ygData.subject: The Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: (Code, I didn t lock Iron Raptor up for one thing.  That was Zardus.  I m not trying to keep IR there at all costs.  I m doing it out of my character s better

(Code, I didn't lock Iron Raptor up for one thing.  That was Zardus.  I'm not 
trying to keep IR there at all costs.  I'm doing it out of my character's 
better judgement.  

Ramhorn believes that IR is probably already dead, or demands or something 
like that would've happened.  Or she may have been tortured and info lost.  
Taking a chunk of Maximal forces from the Ark and other ship is a stupid 
tactic to him.

Kluster, well, Kluster thinks most of the Maximals on Past Earth are a bunch 
of incompitent fools and to him, they're proving his theory.

As for Nemesis Enforcer, he knows that he's a little crazy, he's not a 
diplomat, and that if he blows the diplo mission with Panzertron, he'll 
probably be in trouble with Zardus.

It's not up to me or ANY of my characters to let IR go.  I'm sorry that she 
is being detained, it's obviously gonna make things boring.  But, I can't do 
anything about it)
